mapper.select: select a.* , b.cityname from cinema a , city b where 1=1 and a.cityid = b.cityid order by cinemaid desc
select a.* , b.cityname from cinema a , city b where 1=1 and a.cityid = b.cityid and cinemaid=#{cinemaid} order by cinemaid desc

select a.* , b.cityname from cinema a , city b where 1=1 and a.cityid = b.cityid
and a.cinemaname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{cinemaname}, '%'))
and a.cityid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{cityid}, '%'))
and a.address like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{address}, '%'))
and a.contact like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contact}, '%'))
and a.memo like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{memo}, '%'))
